trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as a base class for other formatters, (for example, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter" />).
trans-unit.target: 다른 포맷터(예: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter" />)의 기본 클래스로 사용되는 추상 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 추상 클래스이므로 직접 인스턴스화할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> class.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to write.

Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> 인스턴스를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> must have a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> associated with it.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> can then write out the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
The only way to associate a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> is by using this constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>을 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter>와 연결하는 유일한 방법은 이 생성자를 사용하는 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: An XML reader to check.
Verifies whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid syndication item.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />가 유효한 배포 항목을 포함하는지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the XML reader contains a valid syndication item, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: XML 판독기가 유효한 배포 항목을 포함하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> used to create the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" />.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> 인스턴스를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> instance.

The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: 새로 생성된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory> 인스턴스는 자신을 만드는 데 사용된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 인스턴스에 자동으로 추가되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> class.
A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.

The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: 새로 생성된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 인스턴스는 자신을 만드는 데 사용된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> 인스턴스에 자동으로 추가되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to use to create the new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" />.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" /> class.
A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" /> instance.
The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: 새로 생성된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink> 인스턴스는 자신을 만드는 데 사용된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 인스턴스에 자동으로 추가되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance used to create the new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 새 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 인스턴스를 만드는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> instance with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> 인스턴스를 사용하여 새 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> instance.

The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: 새로 생성된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson> 인스턴스는 자신을 만드는 데 사용된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 인스턴스에 자동으로 추가되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> associated with the formatter.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> associated with the formatter.

A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> is associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> by passing in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> constructor.
Loads element extensions.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> to load the element extensions into.
The maximum allowable size for an element extension (in bytes).
Loads element extensions into the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> and maximum extension size.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> 및 최대 확장 크기를 사용하여 요소 확장을 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />에 로드합니다.

trans-unit.source: The RSS 2.0 and Atom 1.0 specifications allow you to add custom element extensions to a syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: RSS 2.0 및 Atom 1.0 사양을 사용하면 사용자 지정 요소 확장을 배포 피드에 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to read in these element extensions from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용하면 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>에서 이러한 요소 확장을 읽을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to load the element extensions into.

Loads element extensions into the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> and maximum extension size.

trans-unit.source: Invalid XML encountered during read.
trans-unit.target: 읽는 동안 잘못된 XML이 발견된 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
Reads in a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.

Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>, associates it with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> and reads the feed into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>를 만들고 이를 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter>와 연결하며 피드를 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 인스턴스로 읽어 들입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.
Associates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.
This method is protected and cannot be called from user code.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 보호되므로 사용자 코드에서 호출할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: To associate a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter>, either create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> instance and pass the constructor a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance or load a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 인스턴스를 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter>와 연결하려면 새 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> 인스턴스를 만들고 그 생성자에 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 인스턴스를 전달하거나, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>을 호출하여 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> 인스턴스를 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>에 로드합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> instance.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> instance.
Attempts to parse an attribute extension.
The name of the element.
The namespace of the element.
The attribute to parse.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> instance to use.
The syndication version to use when parsing.
trans-unit.target: 구문 분석 시 사용할 배포 버전입니다.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to parse an attribute extension using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> 인스턴스를 사용하여 특성 확장의 구문 분석을 시도합니다.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the attribute was parsed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 특성이 성공적으로 구문 분석되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: To control how attribute extensions are parsed, derive your own class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory> and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory.TryParseAttribute%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 특성 확장 구문 분석 방법을 제어하려면 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory>에서 고유한 클래스를 파생시키고 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory.TryParseAttribute%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> 메서드를 재정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: The content to parse.
Attempts to parse syndication item content using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 인스턴스를 사용하여 배포 항목 내용의 구문 분석을 시도합니다.

trans-unit.target: 내용이 성공적으로 구문 분석되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: To control how syndication content is parsed, derive your own class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem.TryParseContent%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationContent%40%29> method.

trans-unit.source: Gets the syndication version of the formatter.
The syndication version of the formatter.
[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] supports the RSS 2.0 and Atom 1.0 specifications.
Writes attribute extensions.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write the extensions to.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> instance that contains the attribute extensions to be written.
The syndication version to write the attribute extensions in.

Writes the attribute extensions in the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> instance to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> in the specified syndication version.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> 인스턴스의 특성 확장을 지정된 배포 버전의 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />에 씁니다.
